channel.title: Server Status Approval
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/xpppab.png[/img]
I've tried this numerous times for the past 4 days. It will not add, it's online. Can you do actually approve it?
My server is a 317 with a UID and RSA enabled so it won't let it login at all. (The bot or whatever it is, because it says it will need to login.) & I don't want to disable RSA just for it to login..

item.title: Server Status Approval
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Sorry, there’s nothing more we can do. Marking as resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Approval
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

We don’t have the ability to approve your server on the server status page, so I’m afraid you’ll have to disable RSA in order to do this. Sorry.

Read full topic
